name: The Faces Lite
description:
Are you saw lot of thriller? Are you like the CSI series? You want to try, how are working the investigators?
Now you can try! Released our famouse iphone game in iPad. You can use lot of realistic face items,noses, eyes, ears and more, and you can modify with scale and rotate for a realistic face. The finished picture you can send it in e-mail or share on facebook for your friends.
This is the free version, in the payed version available much more items.
